[Home](./index.md) &gt; [bge-core](./bge-core.md) &gt; [Card](./bge-core.card.md)

## Card class

 A game object representing a rectangular playing card.  Can have arbitrary front and back images, dimensions (including thickness), and rounded corners. Specify dimensions using the `@Card.width()`<!-- -->, `@Card.height()`<!-- -->, and `@Card.thickness` decorators on your custom class.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Card extends GameObject implements ITextEmbeddable 
```
**Extends:** [GameObject](./bge-core.gameobject.md)

**Implements:** [ITextEmbeddable](./bge-core.itextembeddable.md)

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)()](./bge-core.card._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Card</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [back](./bge-core.card.back.md) |  | [ICardFace](./bge-core.icardface.md) | Stores graphical information about the back face of the card. |
|  [footprint](./bge-core.card.footprint.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [Footprint](./bge-core.footprint.md) |  |
|  [front](./bge-core.card.front.md) |  | [ICardFace](./bge-core.icardface.md) | Stores graphical information about the front face of the card, as seen if the card isn't hidden. |
|  [height](./bge-core.card.height.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | Height of the card in centimeters. |
|  [hidden](./bge-core.card.hidden.md) |  | [ICardFace](./bge-core.icardface.md) | Stores graphical information about the front face of the card, as seen if the card is hidden. |
|  [thickness](./bge-core.card.thickness.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | Thickness of the card in centimeters. |
|  [width](./bge-core.card.width.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | Width of the card in centimeters. |
